snippet: Because an expected bidding war has been delayed by new rules, confusion, infighting and counterproposals, Tanaka has become a figure of intense interest in major league baseball.
abstract: Masahiro Tanaka has become a figure of unusual interest for Major League Baseball during unexpected bidding war delayed by new rules, confusion, infighting and counter-proposals; dragging out process has created perception that Tanaka is best free agent available.
lead_paragraph: Because an expected bidding war has been delayed by new rules, confusion, infighting and counterproposals, Tanaka has become a figure of intense interest in major league baseball.

headline.main: Delays in Bidding Help Put Focus on Masahiro Tanaka
headline.print_headline: Delays in Tanaka Bidding Help Put Focus on Him
